Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::

Aelo cursed while she tried to avoid Zardus's shots "I'll you skin 
alive!!!!"shouted anger Aelo against Mosquitor"Ocipite cover me!!!!"

Aelo transformed to beast mode (a prey-bird) and she started to 
attack Mosquitor's acyd tank with her craws and beack. "I'll regret 
it" thought OCipite and shr fired 25 energyballs agains Zardus


> ::Mosquitor/Zardus::
> 
> Mosquitor continues flying up, several shots hitting him in the 
side but the rest heading toward Celeno because of his continued 
upward movement. His side was quickly beginning to bleed, but he 
doesn't notice.
> 
> "Melt, in the name of the leadership!!!" (yes yes, I know that's a 
cheap rip-ff of Inferno. Shut up) sounds from his voicebox as the 
spikes on his mouthpiece lock in, acid beginning to flow from the 
acid tank on his back, through his mouthpiece, and into Celeno, 
spreading over her internal circuitry and beginning its work.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zardus ducks under a feather missile the other hitting him as he 
dives back behind his plate, coming back out from the other side and 
firing two missiles at Aelo's feet, jumping into the air.
> 
> 
> 
>
